ResourceHeader.ResourceName: CLU3 STAFF-SA Polarization and Propagation Parameters (8Hz - 4KHz)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains the polarization and propagation parameters in the frequency range 8 Hz - 4 KHz.

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3   STAFF Polar  angle   of  the   direction   of  propagation
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3   STAFF Polar  angle   of  the   direction   of  propagation   in  MFA  coordinate system (SVD)

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3   STAFF Azymuthal  angle  of  the  direction  of  propagation
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3   STAFF Azymuthal  angle  of  the  direction  of  propagation  in  MFA coordinate system (SVD).

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3   STAFF Ellipticity of the polarization
Cluster 3   STAFF Degre of polarization in the polarization plane
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3    STAFF Degre of polarization in the polarization plane (SVD)

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3   STAFF Sum of the three magnetic auto-power spectra.
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3    STAFF Sum of the three magnetic auto-power spectra.

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3   STAFF Parallel   component   of   the   Poynting   vector
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3    STAFF Parallel   component   of   the   Poynting   vector   normalized   by   its standard deviation.

Parameter.Name: Cluster 3   STAFF Sum of the two electric auto-power spectra.
Parameter.Description: Cluster 3   STAFF Sum of the two electric auto-power spectra.
